content.detailedDescription: I heard a strange animal outside and went to investigate. i looked up at the sky, and at that point i saw three lights in a tiangle formation gliding directly overhead from south to north above the pachy clouds making no sound, and fading out until i could not see them anymore. this all took place at dusk, when the sun was slightly above the horizon, so there was light enough to see if these  had been airplanes.
content.summary: Tiangle formation of lights passing dierectly overhead

content.detailedDescription: Normal aircraft speed light moving-not flashing-orange in color-less than 1 mile high-turns-vanishes
content.summary: Normal aircraft speed light moving-not flashing-orange in color-less than 1 mile high-turns-vanishes

content.detailedDescription: While sitting on my balcony, i heard the sound of a prop airplane.  as i looked i saw a twin engine flying from nw to se, looking past the craft i noticed, at first, was a flock of birds.  shortly after the airplane passed between myself and this flock of birds.  i thought that was a really high altitude for a flock of birds, given that the aircraft was flying at around 1000-1500ft.  the aircraft kept it's heading, the flock of birds was a circular formation above, and a pair hovering just underneath, slightly to the south of the larger formation.  as i watched them, considering the height they were at, they moved about each other in precise slow orbits.  they moved in curving seemingly random motions, but always the low, southern pair seemed to stay stationary.  the best way to describe the motion of these objects would a coordinated airshow dance routine in the sky. as the birds turned, i noticed the reflections of sharp sunlight, contrasted by darker tones of something solid. given my estimated altitude of these, what i now considered to be objects and not birds, around 5000-7000ft, the rate at which they climbed without effort, the tight patterns in which they moved, and the relative distance they were from me.  this was all observed from a west facing balcony, looking west towards south denver from aurora.  the event lasted 3-5 minutes, at which point, from staring into the sky for so long and focusing so hard, my eyes began to water and i was seeing spots.  clearing my now blurry vision, i looked back for them and there was nothing.  i was deliberating and observing behavior too much to have remembered to grab my camera, which could obviously capture the objects at a much closer relative distance.
content.summary: Dancing spaceship troupe

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: I was driving on blackrock rd in royersford/collegeville head north. i was approaching rt 29/collegeville rd when i had seen a golden glowing object steadily moving sw to ne about 500ft or less in front of me. i mentioned to my 9 year old son; "that is not an airplane. keep your eye on that." we did not witness any blinking lights, blue, red or green on the object. i proceeded about 3/4 miles forward on the rd, over rt 29 towards rt 113. i stopped approx 400ft from rt 113 and pulled over. my son and i had lost the object then we had spotted it again. it was bright goldish orange almost like intense flames with no trails of lights like a meteor or smoke like exhaust. it was traveling a little faster than a jet but not as high of an altitude. as it proceeded to the ne it started to flicker. at this point i was expecting to see blinking lights but we had not. the object diminished in intensiity and size till it was as small as as a dim star then disappeared. about a minute or less after witnessing that object another appeared in the same exact fashion, intesity, color, direction, height and speed and at the same area it too flickered then disapeared just as the first one. about a minute after the second object a third one appeared. this one was a little brighter but traveled at the same speed direction and almost exactly same route but this one lasted a little longer in the sky. i was able to capture the second and third one on my iphone video and the third one i was able to snap two pictures using zoom on one of the pics. this is not the first time i have seen an object like this. last year my wife and i had seen one, it was bright white like a star, no trail, no sound and unlike jet lights it stayed as bright from behind us to in front of us until it went up and diminished almost like it took off with intense speed. that same year two neighbors and i had witnessed a huge object lit up underneath with three white lights, triangle formation, with a red orb leading it and a military jet following it.
content.summary: 3 consecutive gold/orange glowing sparkling each about 1 min apart

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was laying on a futon on my porch, listening to the radio and watching the night sky.  
2. i was on the porch watching the sky for a total of 4 hours last night.  from 10-2, i saw a lot of stuff (more detail to follow).  at 12am, i saw what this report is about.  and from 12-2, absolutely nothing happened.
3. i literally gasped when i saw the object because i knew it was something extraordinary, something very special and rare, something that i had never seen before and might never see again in my life.  i got a huge adrenaline rush and i focused as hard as i could on keeping these things in view.  it was instantaneous, i knew immediately that i was looking at something other-worldly.  
4. i can't give a second-to-second replay of what these objects did, but in a nutshell, they did a beautiful "dance" in the sky.  at least twice, they formed a perfectly symmetrical triangle that looked exactly like what i saw before (details below).    
5. during the sighting, i was in awe.  it was utterly breathtaking, a truly beautiful sight.  i felt like this was a performance directed at me, that these things did a dance just for me, and they used the whole sky to do it.  it was a magical moment.  after the sighting, i was in disbelief.  this is my second sighting in less than a month.  this very closely resembled what i saw before, but was completely different at the same time.  there was a moment of recognition... a moment when i thought, "hey, i've seen that before!" which in itself is mindblowing.  on top of everyting *else* that i saw, i feel like maybe i'm meant to experience something, like maybe i am tuned into something and that maybe some kind communication, or acknowledgement of some kind could be meant for me.  i felt a personal touch to what i saw - like the dance catered to my tastes, that it was performed for my enjoyment.  
6. they simply faded away into the dark, still dancing.  

here's my account: 

last night, i saw 3 lights travelling south to north at a very high rate of speed, at an unknown altitude but approximately 5000ft.  they were bunched up like a handful of rocks -- i literally gasped when i saw it.  i locked my eyes in, i sprung to my feet, and i watched intently.  as it got to the other side of the sky, it turned into the same triangle i saw on april 27th.  it was a "holy moly" moment, for sure.  i screamed for my girlfriend to come out, but she didn't hear me because the sliding glass door was shut; i had to take my eyes off for a split second. i really didn't want to do that, but i did... i got the door open, yelled for her, and then i jumped back and found the 3 objects in an almost vertical alignment, spaced what i figured was a mile or so apart.... and they were moving up.  i pointed at them and tried to get her to see it too -- she looked right at it!!!!  but she didn't see it.  her eyes are bad, for one, and she'd been watching tv in a dark room when i called her so her eyes were having a hard time adjusting to the light i guess.

i've been using the word "dance" to describe what they did because they really did dance.  it was breathtaking.  i've compared it to a marching band, or synchronized swimmers.  it was very whimsical, and almost musical.  i am having a hard time remembering the detail of each individual object -- i think they were circular or even football shaped, and i vaguely remember seeing a bright dot on at least one of them, but that could have been a star shining next to it or through it.  i also remember what looked like a flashing light on one, but that also could have just been the flicker of the stars.  i do know that they were 3 objects that interacted with eachother - not like aircraft, but like creatures.  it's weird, but... they seemed to interact like dolphins.    it was one of the most beautiful things i've ever seen in my life.  it lasted 30-40 seconds or so, i think.   to my dismay, they faded into the sky, still dancing.  i watched for another minute or two hoping they'd come back, but they were gone.  this sighting happened at 12am; the 2 hours before the actual sighting (10-2)were very eventful, i could easily file two or three other reports about the *other* things i saw last night.  i stayed out till about 2am, but absolutely nothing happened between 12 and 2.  :(
content.summary: 3 lights formed shapes, danced in the sky

content.detailedDescription: On 10/16/2012 i was working at a water injection well on deskins rd in vansant va. at about 1:00 pm we noticed a bright shining cylinder high in the sky. it apeard to spin from time to time and reflect the sun light. it hoverd in one spot for a long time and then it slowley started moving to our right. while watching this we noticed a orb which came out of know where moving around and then it descende towards us and went by on our right about 30 to 40 feet away. it was lit like a light bulb about the size of a tennis ball with something moving inside. it followed the road and went up into the tree line and we lost sight of it.One guy said when the small orbe went past he felt at peace. also there wase some other orbs up higher next to the main object.We also saw some jets just befor seeing the main object.And jets after seeing the main object.Also the cross shaped object flying frome right to left high in the sky it appeared to have a white glow to it. it was a very interesting day. and as i was saying there were multiple witnesses which were co-workers.And there was a feeling of excitement.The object moved off to the north west and i had to leave to return to the office.Up on arrival to the office other co-workers were asking if i saw the object.So some of them saw it to there were passenger jets flying by and the main object was at a higher altitude.
content.summary: It was a cyliender it hoverd in one spot high in the sky for atleast 2 hours then moved away slow also saw sevrial orbs a cross shaped craft fly by and a small orbe came down and went right by us about 30 to 40 feet away

content.detailedDescription: At about 1pm, i was sitting on our patio. i looked between the two palm trees and saw three white objects, in a v formation, flying north. they were flying at a very slow pace. i sat there for a moment, trying to figure out what i was seeing. not planes, not birds, not kites. drones? totally silent. they continued to come in my direction, but the lead object had gone quite a ways beyond the two bringing up the rear. i called for my husband to come outside. we both stood there, trying to figure out what we were seeing. my husband thought he could see wings toward the rear of the objects.  i ran back into the house and grabbed my camera, and dashed out onto the balcony to snap a picture. by then, the objects had stopped coming in our direction and seemed to be separating. two of them continued flying in formation, and the third took off in another direction. sadly, that is all of my story. i did get two of the objects in a photo, but as with many ufo photos, i've got mostly blue skies, with a couple of white dots.
content.summary: 3 white object in v formation seemed to glide through sky. no sound.

content.detailedDescription: Crop circle appeared and has remained for at least 10 days.  vegetation remarkable in it's depression (not broken but cleanly bent).  walked into.  patterns observed:  would like an areal view.  looks like code as well as symbols.
content.summary: Crop circle!

content.detailedDescription: I was exiting my vehicle at my house after work at 9:33 pm april 17,2013. i looked up at the night sky to observe the stars. i observed two jet flying side by side, they had to be military because they were close together. my estimation was 10 plane widths apart, traveling west and i heard no sound. the wing lights were about the width of my index finger at arms length. at the same time i noticed a bright white object overtake them from the east at a very high rate of speed. my first impression was that it was a light from a helicopter flying at a much lower altitude which would explain the difference in perceived speed. at this time no sound was heard. as the object arrived at the wake of the jet on the right it made a sudden right angle turn to the left changed color to a pink or light red and crossed the wake of the jet on the left and went south at tremendous speed. it was gone from my field of vision in less than a second, the surrounding houses and trees made it impossible for me to see it disappear over the southern horizon. at first i didn't realize what i had just witnessed, only after i played it over in my mind did i realize this object did things that weren't possible. it made that right angle turn instantly without slowing and increased in speed after the direction change. during the event i was without emotion, it as only after it was over did i have a feeling of eeriness.
content.summary: Object over took two military jets made right angle turn exited at tremendous speed

content.detailedDescription:
I do not want a call about this.  this is just an air plane that can confuse people. 

its black plane with a single red light the top or bottom of the plane.  i could make out the surface of the plane and it looks like the shape of the b2.

when the planes are crossing the horizon.  you just see this solid red light on that looked like a break light, but not flashing.  its pretty bright or it was really close.  not sure.  

its when the plane changes directions is when we light seems to just disappear.   i only got lucky in the fact that there was a enough back ground lighting from liberty mo to see the outline of the plane.  


i have actually seen them a few times since december, but figured i would post this after i had a neighbor ask me about them.   guess it confused him.
content.summary: Just a plane with odd lighting

content.detailedDescription: I was in the street and looked up. i saw a big bright orange pulsating light followed by three more at about 10 second intervals. when i first saw it i could tell it was not an aircraft, and when the others appeared i knew they were not aircraft either. i thought it was really exciting. they headed ne and were visible for about 2 min total. they would slow down and then made a 90 degree turn at the same spot and then they vanished one by one as they reached the same spot.
content.summary: 4 pulsating orbs in a line headed from sw to ne the made a 90 dgree turn at the same spot and faded out

content.detailedDescription: About 10:00 my brother and i watched several ships around the sky standing in the yard around the house.  we counted between 10 and 15 light ships.  it was hard to count them because we had to use binoculars on some of them.  five ships where closer, two towards the north, one nearly straight up, one to the west and one in the south.  they were triangular with green, yellow and red flashing lights.  at one point a boomerang shaped ship flew through the sky and was solid white light, but not as bright as the others all though it seemed larger.  several airplanes flew across the sky.  i believe they were large commercial air craft in route to and from, dallas ft worth.
content.summary: Beautiful ships surrounding with extremely bright lights.

content.detailedDescription: One night i was at my mom and dads house looking up ufos on the computer and then i decided to get some fresh air so i went outside and looked up in the night sky where i saw what i thought was a star at first  but all of a sudden the light started to descend down over the tree tops so i called my mom and dad outside. my mom was the first to come out to see what i was looking at it was huge there was 3 lights in a chevron or flying v shape ufo it was very low in altitude moved very slow and made a sound kind of a high pitch humming sound. by the time my dad came out of the house he had a sony mavica camera in hand so he tryed taking pictures but the camera did not turn on and would not work on a fully charged battery? so we just watch it fly over the tree tops as it slowly got out of our sight. when we all went back inside we were all in shock as to what we just saw in the night skys of upsate new york the crazy thing is the sony movica camera worked fine after we went back inside.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: What we are looking at it was huge there was 3 lights in a chevron or flying v shape ufo it was very low in altitude moved very slow and made a sound kind of a high pitch humming sound.

content.detailedDescription: I've always been a skeptic of aliens and ufos, up until two nights ago, and i feel lost and confused, that's why i am here. i would like to start off by telling you that about 3 weeks ago i saw an unidentified flying object that looked like a fireball in the sky, and since then i have felt like i am being watched. two nights ago as i was about to go to sleep i saw something in my room through my peripheral vision. i don't remember going to sleep, but i do remember waking up in a metal room and i was lying on a metal bed and i was restrained. i struggled to turn my head and i saw many people lying in these metal beds just like mine and  i focused on one in particular which i realized was my sister, it seemed that everyone was in some state of unconsciousness. at that point i realized that something was very wrong and i was conscious of the scary situation i was in. i started to panic and tried to free myself. at that point i realized that i was surrounded by short beings, they were grayish in color and seemed oblivious to the fact that i was trying to fight my way out of the restraints. suddenly out of nowhere came a bright light and another being appeared, this one was taller and had a more oval shaped head with indentations in it and it was almost tan in color. it communicated with me telepathically and i asked it what it was doing to us and it said "we are looking at your dna." i asked it why it was doing this to us and it replied "all humans have alien dna, but not all humans have the same alien dna"  i asked it where they were from and it said "we come from sirius" and it also told me that they have been coming to me for a long time. at that point it disappeared and my fear returned and i started screaming from the top of my lungs, the next thing i remember is jumping up from my bed screaming waking up everyone in the house.I haven't slept for 2 nights now.....
content.summary: Possible communication with beings

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
I live right next to phoenix airport so i know an airplane when i see one and can even use the planes as a control to decide whether or not what im seeing is a ufo or plane.
  the first ufo was one of the most amazing i've ever seen. i was on my way to the bank with my roommate when i saw just above the building outline a very bright star in the sky. this was around 5 p.M. so it was still very light out. it looked as if a bright bomb just went off. i stared untill the building blocked my view and went inside the bank to do my transaction. upon leaving the bank i immediately looked for this star again but what i saw next was incredible. it was no longer in the shape of a star but had the same intense brightness to it. it had elongated itself in just the ten minutes i was in the bank. it started as a large star shape and ended stretching across the sky. if i held my hand up to it to get a size it was about half the size of my pinky finger and im estimating it was a good 20 miles out from my position. this must have meant that it was huge in size. lots of other people had to of seen the same thing especially at my bank because i was pointing it out to anybody i could. my roommate seen it to but didnt think anything of it cause he hates when i talk about this stuff. but i watched it for as long as i could then went inside. after about an hour i came back out for a smoke and it was gone.
  the next set of sightings all happened one after the other which i thought was odd considering ive never seen so many different looking ufo's in one sitting. i was calling my brother to talk to him about a  sighting we shared in a few years back in washingtons national forest. about 30 seconds into the call i looked up, as i always do, and noticed two star like bright shapes shooting across the sky directly towards a plane just taking off. i thought they were gonna crash so i started freaking out and my brother kept asking wats going on but i was just so transfixed on the situation above to answer. once they came close to the airplane they simply faded out and disappeared.
  only a cople minutes after that last sight i was telling my brother what had just happened and was looking a little to the left from where i had just witnessed the two star tlike shaped and saw another incredible sight. it looked like a shooting star but instead of a straight line it kind of dotted across the sky and every dot it left behind was a different color. then disappeared just like a shooting star. the best thing about this sighting was that it looked as though it was only a couple hundred feet off the ground and maybe only a couple of blocks away from my backyard where i was during all these night sightings. 
  then i started to freak out about that and my brother was just puzzled as to what was going on. i looked off to the left and noticed 2 or 3 litttle uniformed lights bobbing and weaving in the sky. they were also star shaped. at this point i ran inside to get my other roommate who is very interested in these kind of thngs and pointed up to the sky where i had just seen the 2 or 3 light and saw in the distance, with my roommate as a second witness, a dim bluish greenish light coming right at us. as it neared it got very bright and very dim and kept dropping and increasing in elevation and it was going very very fast. it changed direction almost above our house then went straight for an airplane that was coming towards us and the ufo was going away from us. i could swear they almost hit and when they had come close it slowed way down and the plane it passed turned around incredibly fast for the size of the plane and stated chasing the craft,
  after that i saw only the little satalite looking ufo's that would constant blink in and out of view as it flew over head. as soon as my other roommates came home i told them what had happened and i was all filled with joy. it was one of the most memerable nights i've ever had.
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: Between 5p.M.-12a.M. several seen in one day

content.detailedDescription: Looking in sky saw 2 red/ orange lights cross the sky directly above traveling at a fixed distance from each other same speed seemed low in the sky went in my house to tell my family came back out again only to see 2 more in the same path and speed as the previous 2 this all happened around 11pm 5/21/13 both time the objects faded into the northern sky they were brightest when they were directly above me. wuld love to have some explanation kind of weird that i saw 2 sets of the same exact lights. does anyone know if anyone officially tracks anything like these happenings from like the goverment or anything?
content.summary: 2 red glowing lights cross the sky

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to walk the dogs. looked up at the sky to stargaze for a moment. looking east. i then turned around still looking up a perfectly round ball slowly moving over trees in backyard. lasted 10 seconds. looked like a harvest moon. i would say the size of a basketball at arms length. the trees it went behind were about  50 yards away and somewhere around 50' tall.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Exactly like earlier post reported in florida . looked like a harvest moon. except for the fact that the moon was behind me during the sighting.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on a residential road along a local golf course with three friends when i noticed a strange, big light in the sky over the golf course. it was there we noticed that object. couldn't have been more than 200-300 feet in the sky, moving slowly in a straight line south east. it was lit by a steady white/yellow light, with a few other lights pulsating. at first glance i thought it may have been an airplane, but it was moving way to slow, there were too many lights and incorrect colors for airplanes, for example we saw blue on the object, and an airplane would not have a pulsating blue light. it kept slowly moving, and now starting to move behind trees close to us, so we continue driving along the golf course and surrounding roads to find it again. we eventually came across a parked car with a couple outside, watching it. we noticed a police officer pulled over as well and he appeared to be watching it. finally, after a few minutes, the object moved behind trees and buildings, and despite moving to different open areas and higher elevations, we could no longer see the object.
content.summary: Triangle shaped object lit with various covers moved slowly across sky

content.detailedDescription: At 3:30 am, we saw what looked like a harvest orange moon out the formal living room.  to get a better look, we went outside and saw an orange large orb with no clear defined edges.  it was about the size of a 1/3 of a normal moon, very bright, made no sound. seemed far away.  at first it did not appear to move, but then it quickly sank into the horizon, like a setting sun. no zig zag movement, just straight down.  we did not know what it was at first and the moon was above us, so it could not have been an eclipse.  by 3:36 am, it had disappeared.
content.summary: Orange orb appeared stationary, then sank into the horizon like a fast setting sun at 3:36am

content.detailedDescription: We had gone to franklin to pick up drinks.. on the way home we were talking ... and had looked over threw a clearing in the trees and saw 4really bright lights hovering .. we slammed on the breaks  to look at it.. the we turned around to go back to park and see if we cloud tell what it was and it was gone.. we could see for several miles in every direction and it was gone. it was just barely above tree level.. so no plane or helicopteri have ever know of can fly that low with no noise. it was much to long to be a helicopter and to still for a normal plane. then we left to come on home and right before we turned in threw another clearing i caught sight of it again but it was much much higher in the sky.. around 6000 feet by this time. the lights on the initial sighting that werevthe two on either end were beach ball size  and the two in the middle were a little larger than basket balls.  it imited no sound.  there were some planes in the skye's way off in the distance... this is a regular flight path so we are quite aware of what plane light look like... this was in no way the same.
content.summary: While traveling home from franklin we were talking about how odd the lights of what we though was a plan looked but when we reached the hill top we saw it.. just hovering there for about 30 sec or so. then it was just gone like just gone

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the porch watching the bats fly around. i saw an orange colored orb moving from north to south at a very high rate of speed. it was completely silent and had no trail behind it like a meteorite.It took the object all of two seconds to move from the roofline to behind the trees which is about fifteen degrees.
content.summary: I saw a bright orange orb very quickly moving south

content.detailedDescription: I was walking the dog, and looked up on a beautiful, clear day. saw an airplane go one direction, then noticed a few seconds later a large, light brown, rectangular form. there was no noise nor contrails. definitely thought it was quite odd.
content.summary: Brown rectangle... seen from bottom

content.detailedDescription: Took dog for a walk and looked up and observed a large bright white lighted object. it then emitted a large circular orange aura. then exploded and the orange aura disappeared or dispersed.
content.summary: Large bright light surrounded with an orange aura

content.detailedDescription: A few friends & i were on a train bridge looking across the horizon of white waltham aerodrome (maidenhead) when a dozen or more lights appeared on the horizon & slowly rose up into the sky then stopped at varied heights and just sat there, being that we were all quite young at the time we were obviously afraid, so we all started running home both excited and scared at what we had seen, our parents blamed low flying planes as been as we saw it over a small local airfield, but i know aeroplanes don't rise up and stop in mid flight, i've seen another sighting since then, but never seen the same one as that summer night since.
content.summary: A few friends & i were on a train bridge looking across the horizon of a local airfield when the lights rose from the horizon

content.detailedDescription:
Myself my 10 year old son, friends were outside talking when someone noticed out of nowhere that this thing popped up with no sound or notice. it just was there. i got on the phone and called the local news and of course they thought it was funny but i didn't especially when the neighbors came out and we were telling them when it just returned without warning. i took a photo but the object showed up much smaller then what i had seen. i also have video of two different sightings in the same area but can not say for sure what they were but one is triangle shaped and other than that it is a pretty clear video. i must tell you since this sighting i can only say if they want to harm us they will and we will never be able to stop them because if they have the ability to just show up without warning you will never know they are there until it is to late. i now find myself looking in the sky out my windows or driving and everything i do ,it has taken over my life and need to know if it was real or if i am crazy. please help me figure this out.............
the object was round, glowing orange and what looked like something sticking out of the top wobbeling. this thing was huge and it wasn't very dark out yet. you all are welcome to examine,keep or whatever you want with what i have.
content.summary: Orange glowing ball

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the bed of my truck talking on the phone. it was dark and i noticed 3 lights in the sky that looked different from the rest. i then noticed they were in a huge triangle shape and silently moving eastward, but very slowly. i was so shocked i couldn't think. i don't remember seeing stars between the lights, but i'm not sure if it was blacked out either. i just sat in awe and shock because it was so incredibly big and silent but defiantly moving. i'm not sure how long i was out there, but i do believe this was directly over my parents home. when it suddenly took off straight upward, silently, i came out of my "trance" and called my parents on my cell phone and told them to hurry out and see this thing. by the time they made it out the light was so high and so faint that they couldn't see it. i have never seen anything move that fast. this was also my first sighting so i had never heard of "triangles" either, until i googled ufos later that night.  i was so stunned to see this that i started to question if i had even seen it, but i'm sure of it now. i had never done drugs or drank anything. i was completely sober. i do recall being just a little scared, but mostly i was just shocked. it felt like time stood still.
content.summary: I noticed the triangle slowly, silently moving above my parents house.  it moved to the east and then shot straight upward so fast and so high i could no longer see it.

content.detailedDescription: I just exited walmart just after dusk. i noticed people staring at the mountains in the east. there were 5 or 6 glowing golden lights in a vertical line ranging from well above the mountain top to one that was about halfway down the mountain. they were silent. i tried to take some video but they were not bright enough to show on the screen, but they were plenty bright in the sky. i just watched them do nothing for maybe 5 minutes. others came out of the store and watched too. slowly, one at a time the top few started to extinguish. i watched the one in the mountains slowly rise vertically where the others had been and it too just slowly vanished. there was an older man there who asked me what they were. i told him. i didn't know. this was my second sighting in 11 years so i felt calm but very excited to see something again. when it was over everyone just got in there vehicles and left.
content.summary: 5 in a vertical line. 1 was mid mtn level. 4 just slowly dimmed and disappeared. 1 slowly rose above mtn level then also disappeared. like evaporation. silent. multiple witnesses. we were in the walmart parking lot.

content.detailedDescription: On dec. 26/2011 i looked out my back door to the sky. always do, seen ufo's in the past.  it was approx. 6:15 p.M. i saw several objects in the sky to the west moving.  i looked longer and saw a lot more objects to the south of that moving around in the sky.  being stationary than just zooming to another place, lots and lots of them.  i called my son, james, to come to the window and look out and tell me what you see.  he looked out and saw objects in the sky moving around very fast.  i asked him if they were planes or anything else we know of that flys at night like that, that bright, mostly bright white.  sometimes you could see blue or orange light but very faint.  i called my friend in forest, about 20 miles west of me.  i asked her to go out and look at the sky.  she was at her mom's place for dinner, xmas dinner and there were other people there, i don't know how many. but some of them went outside too and looked at the sky, they all saw the same things james and i saw, bright round lights moving very very fast in the sky, very high in the sky.  except for one.  over the next 15 min. i went back to my back door several times to check and see if they were still up there, they were.  i was scared to death, i closed all my curtains. one last time at about 30 mins. from the first sighting i looked out my back door again, the hair on my arms and the back of my neck stood up, i shivered, didn't know why, looked over to my right and there it was, white light, bright white light that zoomed past the side of my house at ground level, i couldn't see over it, then it just went away, zoomed upwards like towards the west sky but just dissappeared, nothing, no noise nothing!  i closed the wooden door and didn't look out any windows for the rest of the night.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Many in the sky, one went/flew right beside my house, just seen white!

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car, on the way home, after picking up my son from work. it was about 12:30 am, after midnight. a clear night, and little wind. i was just a few houses away from home, when my son yells out "ufo!" i looked in the direction he indicated, on his side of the car, and didn't see anything. as i was turning right into my driveway, i looked again, and saw a red light. i parked the car in my front yard, and quickly exited, and rushed to the side of the garage that i expected the object to be more easily seen. i was not prepared for what i saw. i truly expected it to be a helicopter, because when i first saw it, it was where helicopters are often seen, going to our local hospital. what i saw was an object, taller than it was wide, moving in a direction that paralleled our local ridges. it was moving at a moderate speed, and it was a bright red. then, it changed color to a dark orange, but still a bright light. the color emminated from the entire object. as it continued on, the colors changed from bright red, to dark orange, then to a dull red, to dark orange, and back to bright red, in a pattern. and absolutely no sound. as it continued on it's path, it turned direction slightly more to the north. that's when i saw a small white round object, that seemed to come from around behind the main object, trailing it, and it made an orbit of the main object. when the smaller white light had come around the front of the main object, and went out of view behind it, the main object seemed to shrink, and just faded out. it didn't go out of view behind the ridge, or fade into the distance, it just disappeared. i wasn't aware my son was even next to me, until i heard him say "where did it go?" i replied "i don't know." he then said "that was a ufo, for sure." the time that i observed it, standing by the side of my garage, was less than two minutes. i was very focused as i was watching it, and felt kind of disturbed when it had gone. i asked my son if he had seen the little white light, and he said "yes." i said "good. i was hoping my vision hadn't blurred, or something." we went into the house, and talked about it for a few minutes, and then went to bed. it was late, and we both had to work the next day.
content.summary: Observed a bright light advancing in the night sky. it moved slowly, red and orange.Then, it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog outside at 12:30am and noticed a large object in the sky with flickering lights.  i got a pair of binoculars to get a better look.  i could see a dark outline of the object and it appeared to be a diamond shape with multiple colored lights in a cross like pattern. my wife and i observed the object for an hour and it slowly headed west away from us.  it would move slowly and then hover for a while and then move again. we have seen unexplained lights in the sky before, but nothing like this.  this was a solid object with definition.
content.summary: Large pulsating object with multicolored lights in a cross shape
